attributes.action: Change the Jobcentreplus website back to the old one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This week the Jobcentreplus website was changed to Directgov website, althought this makes Directgov look artificially more popular than it really is (As Jobcentreplus was one of the UK's most visited sites) the new search is virtually useless, produces next to no vacancy results and is very hard to use, not to nention most confusing. It simply does not work as good as the old one and at a time when people are looking to return to work this is not on. Please return the old Jobcentreplus jobsearch, it worked. It wasnt broke so dont fix it. Thank you Gordon.
